thread.title: charles pereira jr
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by charles pereira jr

author: charles pereira jr
title: charles pereira jr
text: Very quick shipping of an unreal scanner. I'm still tryi ng to get the thi ng working, but so far no success. I'm going to shoot an email over to the techs at zip scanners to see if they can set me straight Otherwise this was a pleasant buying experience for me. Chuck....Aloha....
